about_the_game:
Become the Edgeweaver in TENSE: a white-knuckle brawler featuring an arsenal unlike any you've seen before. But something isn't quite right: your life drains over time, your foes revive, and your weapons shatter. Can you endure and save the world? No Breaks, No Rules, No Mercy.

Indecision means failure - keep moving, fighting, and clearing rooms to get closer to perfection each run.

RESTORE THE BALANCE OF GUNFU AND HUGFU

Pre-Alpha Footage

The overwhelming influence of GunFu has tainted the world into a chaotic nightmare disguised as a playful façade. Killing has become inconsequential. Relationships have become meaningless. Awaken the transformative power of HugFu and embark on a one-of-a-kind journey of self discovery. You'll make a lot of quirky but lovable new friends along the way!

UNLEASH THE EDGEWEAVER'S ARSENAL

Pre-Alpha Footage

The Edgeweaver is lethal with genre-breaking weapons, but juggling resources and finishing enemies is a strategic necessity to survive. Weapons can be taken from foes - but used a limited amount of time before they break. To make matters worse, your health is constantly draining. Can you overcome the odds?



Prepare for a brand new white-knuckle roguelite experience. Things are going to get TENSE!
